tests.code:
const processSid_fixedValue = 'c2095ccf-896b-46a0-b5e9-8e5b7e288270' 
const processTaskSid_fixedValue = '5f719bb1-11b8-43d9-a9fd-66e55306f4eb'
const mockReq = await mocks.req()
const mockRes = await mocks.mockResponse()
mockReq.params = { processTaskSid: processTaskSid_fixedValue, op: "script_getloadparams", tasktype }
mockReq.query = { processSid: processSid_fixedValue }
await functions.getConfig(mockReq, mockRes)
expect(mockRes.statusCode).to.equal(200)
const result = mockRes.body
expect(result.length).to.equal(1)

expect(result[0].ParameterName).to.equal('FILE_NAME')
expect(result[0].PrefillType).to.equal('Fixed_Value')
expect(result[0].PrefillField).to.equal('fixValFileName')
expect(result[0].Description).to.equal('Fixed Value - fixValFileName')
expect(result[0].TaskSID).to.not.exist

tests.title: retrieves all possible members for adding to groups
tests.fullTitle: api-user Group Controller Tests get tests retrieves all possible members for adding to groups
tests.code:
const Group = await models.getModel(config.tenantOne.tenantId, 'Group');
const groupController = new GroupController(config.tenantOne);
const group = testGroups[9];
const response = await groupController.getNonMembers(group.groupGuid);
const results = response.results;
expect(results.length).to.be.equal(response.total);
// empty group, so test a sampling of accounts that should be non-members
expect(results).to.include.deep({ memberGuid: "A03BDD24-A0BA-4071-9A5B-2833C865EC3D",
                                  memberId: 1,
                                  memberName: "Administrators",
                                  memberType: "Group"
                                })
expect(results).to.include.deep({ memberGuid: testGroups[8].groupGuid.toUpperCase(),
                                  memberId: testGroups[8].groupId,
                                  memberName: testGroups[8].groupName,
                                  memberType: "Group"
                                })
expect(results).to.include.deep({ memberGuid: '4E99E0DD-B3B3-4D5D-826D-3D5AE62A16CF',
                                  memberId: 1,
                                  memberName: 'System System',
                                  memberType: 'User'
                                })
// two system accounts that should not be returned, plus the group itself
expect(results).to.not.include.deep({ memberGuid: 'D8C469C3-F781-4179-A09C-6D148885FB30',
                                               memberId: 92,
                                               memberName: "Integrify System",
                                               memberType: "User"
                                             })
expect(results).to.not.include.deep({ memberGuid: '64EC8FC9-B426-4376-A1A4-3AD16F0F9906',
                                               memberId: 96,
                                               memberName: "Guest Account",
                                               memberType: "User"
                                             })
expect(results).to.not.include.deep({ memberGuid: testGroups[9].groupGuid.toUpperCase(),
                                           memberId: testGroups[9].groupId,
                                           memberName: testGroups[9].groupName,
                                           memberType: "Group"
                                         })

expect(firstRow.at(2).find('.mdi-menu-open').exists()).to.equal(true); // Manage Task menu icon
expect(firstRow.at(2).find('.v-menu').exists()).to.equal(true); // manage task menu

expect(firstRow.at(5).text()).to.equal('2/24/2021'); // date completed
expect(firstRow.at(6).text()).to.equal('1'); // manager id
expect(firstRow.at(7).find('button.mdi-magnify').exists()).to.equal(true); // link to Task
expect(firstRow.at(8).text()).to.equal('System Task - Update Profile'); // task name
